item.title: Report X-2025020477
item.description:
Report X-2025020477

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-13T06:18:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-11
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The box has no markings on it. The box contains 4X3.8oz aerosol cans of Dove Dry Spray and 3X3.8oz aerosol cans of Dove men care. The box was leaked on by another damaged package and when the box was opened up the aerosol cans were found. The aerosol cans did not leak. This is an undeclared hazmat.
